name: int
description: The objective of this project is to build an online art gallery using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap and get practical in-depth knowledge of using the web development technologies. With the modernizing society, the love for art, the aesthetic, is also booming. People love to give certain vibe to their houses and areas of work by using different kind of art pieces. So, here on this website we will provide them with some lovely art pieces.
